10. domesticis senibus: i. e. whom age and infirmity keep at home.

12. alumni confessionis suae, ‘ pensioners of their confession'3 i. e. whose brave witness entitles them to the support of their follow- creedsmen3 comp. ad mart. 1 amit. The charitable actions of the Christiana towards their suffering brethren are mentioned Euseb. iv. 23 ; they were prohibited by Licinius, Euseb. x. 8.
